title: New Year's Eve
body: New Year's Eve is the party of the year. And of course we have found the perfect drinks for your evening.

slider1.title: Best for predinner
slider1.body: Our guests typically arrive on an empty stomach. Choose a lighter drink so that you don't get too drunk before sitting down to dinner.

slider2.title: For dinner
slider2.body: This is for those who do not drink wine, or who simply want a good side dish for their food

slider3.title: Let´s party
slider3.body: The party has officially kicked off and we've got a list of drinks that will make everyone at the party as happy as a clown with a balloon animal!

title: Christmas Eve
body: An evening that is truly about hygge, family and togetherness - why not enjoy it with a delicious cocktail? Whether you are sitting on the couch waiting for the group singing to be over or taking a spin around the tree, below we have collected the best drinks for your evening

slider1.title: For the hygge
slider1.body: You are excited, gifts and lots of food are waiting ahead. Coziness is needed, and these cocktails are just what you need to get started.

slider2.title: Til julemiddagen
slider2.body: Masser af sovs og kærlighed - eller hvad end du er til. Her passer kraftige, krydrede cocktails med snaps perfekt til de mange smagsindtryk.

slider3.title: Til risalamanden
slider3.body: Fællessangen er ovre, pakkerne er åbnet og nu skal du for alvor hygge. Her er et par søde bud, der komplementerer risalamanden fantastisk godt.

title: Julefrokost
body: Christmas paraties is the time of year when friends and family come together. We have therefore collected the best drinks for your julefrokost.

slider1.title: Til silden
slider1.body: Dine gæster er ankommet med det gode humør, silden er sat på bordet og lige netop de her drinks er perfekte til det.

slider2.title: Til pakkelegen
slider2.body: Nu skal der stjæles pakker, og til det skal der selvfølgelig bruges nogle drinks til at holde tempoet oppe.

slider3.title: Når du har fået lidt for meget
slider3.body: Festen er i fuld sving, og du har brug for en opkvikkende drink, så her har vi samlet de perfekte drinks
